it.polimi.se2018.mvc.model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.Observable<Response>
      • it.polimi.se2018.mvc.model.Board

  • public class Board
extends Observable<Response>
    This class represents the board, that is considered the ClientData in MVC
